summary: Charleen, 15, quick-witted and sassy, is Kurt Cobain's biggest fan and wonders why 'growing up' has to be so complicated. One day, feeling especially melodramatic and rebellious, she ... See full summary »
cast: Jasna Fritzi Bauer|Heike Makatsch|Aurel Manthei|Simon Schwarz|Lauritz Greve|Dorothea Walda|Amelie Plaas-Link|Sandro Lohmann|Nikolaus Frei|Heike Koslowski|Rafael Gareisen|Joana Verbeek von Loewis|Horst Sachtleben|Michael Gempart|Jens Peter Nünemann|Carolin Weber|Katharina Spiering|Jörg Witte|Lilly Forgách|Johanna Krieg
title: About a Girl
